mapper.select: select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_res_reg as resReg, user_tel as tel, user_email as email, user_gender as gender, user_age as age, user_point as point, user_authcode as authcode, user_authstatus as authstatus, user_status as status, user_disabled as disabled, user_created_date as createdDate from YOGIYO_USER
